timeline.bodyText:
I think here you can just invoke $rootScope.$brodcast(events.MAINTENANCE_MODE_  directly in the if / else clauses. The newGenericSettingProgressEventHandler doesn't actually seem to do anything.
That pattern is used for builds / group builds because they share some common behaviour. It isn't necessary here since it's just an abstraction over a single method call.
